name: UnS3TaB2Le
description:
!WARNING! This game is highly scientifically inaccurate

hydrogen is tired of having only one electron, help him to collect the other eight electrons on the map, and defend him from the other atoms before it decays.

Controls:

Move with WASD; Rotate with the mouse; Trow your electron with the left mouse button

in case the game does not work from web, i left the downlodable version
